title: Thin, Modern Monospaced
content:
Hello. I have been obsessing over the attached typeface and can't figure it out. I love it. It's from a restaurant in Hong Kong, as featured on [http://yatzer.com/Sal-Curioso-Hong-Kong](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004021/http:/yatzer.com/Sal-Curioso-Hong-Kong "http://yatzer.com/Sal-Curioso-Hong-Kong"). Any monospace aficionados out there who can help ID this? Thanks.

Font: 

 T-Star Mono 

Solved By: 

 [Jan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004021/http:/typophile.com/user/17243 "View user profile.")
